{"name": "Shipt", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Get $4.99/month Shipt membership with SNAP EBT.

Step 1: Add your EBT card. In the Shipt app, click Account, then Payments, then Add Card. Voila.

Step 2: Shop EBT-eligible items. Eligible items are searchable in the app, and you’ll also see them tagged while browsing.

Step 3: Check out. Use your EBT card for eligible items, and another card for everything else.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.shipt.com/lp/snap", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(205) 502-2500", "type": "voice"}]}
